roles.title: Senior Full-stack / AI Engineer
highlights: Built an AI assistant that routes accounting questions to the right specialist automatically
Made it so the AI actually understands what "revenue" or "expenses" mean in context
Added controls so teams only see AI features they're paying for
Set up tracking to know when the AI is slow or failing

roles.title: Senior AI Product Engineer (Web and Mobile)
highlights: Built a system that recommends which truck to send for each delivery, replacing manual guesswork
Created a chat interface where ops managers can ask questions in plain English and get answers
Turned dispatcher expertise into 45+ commands the AI can run on its own
Built a data pipeline in Go that processes truck location events in real-time

Created backend services that process document templates and plug into the AI
Shipped components for uploading templates and managing AI interactions
